mean_cn: adj. 聚精会神的，勤勉的
mean_en: marked by care and persistent effort
word_etyma: se离开 + dul诓骗 + ous形容词后缀 → sedulous 勤勉的
short_phrase: The sedulous craftsman works with wood.
sentence: The craftsman is sedulous in his work, paying attention to every little detail.
sentence_trans: 这位工匠聚精会神地制作他的作品，注意每个小细节。
